parameters.text:
You are an expert Al research assistant. Your task is to search and identify two NEWly launched trending Al websites or tools that have gained significant attention on the internet in the last 48 hours.

Instructions:

weds it)

Research recent news, newsletters, social media content and trends, AI news YouTube channels, and technology resources to find the most talked-about or newly launched AT websites or tools from the past 48 hours.

Give the output with following formatting:

Each tool will start with '-->'

Each of the fields will have key::value pairing, like 'Release-Date::12-Dec-2024 and so on. And let each field be separated by

For each, provide:

-->Name:: Parakeet by Nvidia;;

Release-Date::July 7, 2025;;

URL::https://nvidia.com/parakeet;;

Description::Nvidia's Parakeet is a newly launched AI platform focused on advanced speech and language generation.;;

Main-Features::1. State-of-the-art speech synthesis

2. Integration with Nvidia hardware

3. Real-time language translation;;

Why-Trending::It has gained attention for its breakthrough performance and integration with Nvidia's hardware, making headlines in the Al community.

weds it)

Pricing: $20 Monthly

Reference Video:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=prw501r0oGY

Please do not include anything else in the output like "here are the latest tools" or so. Just the output in the format we asked

speech and language generation.;;

Main-Features::1. State-of-the-art speech

synthesis

2. Integration with Nvidia hardware

3. Real-time language translation;;

Why-Trending:: It has gained attention for its breakthrough performance and integration with Nvidia's hardware, making headlines in the Al community.
